hymn.title: Shine Thou upon us, Lord
hymn.category: Service—By being Wrought upon by the Lord

creators.author: John Ellerton, in Hymns Ancient and Modern, 1889

layout.singingstanza: Shine Thou up -- on us, Lord, True Light of men, to -- day, And through the writ -- ten Word Thy ver -- y self dis -- play; That so from hearts which burn With gaz -- ing on Thy face, Thy lit -- tle ones may learn The won -- ders of Thy grace.

lyrics.stanza: Shine Thou upon us, Lord, True Light of men, today, And through the written Word Thy very self display; That so from hearts which burn With gazing on Thy face, Thy little ones may learn The wonders of Thy grace.

Breathe Thou upon us, Lord, Thy Spirit's living flame, That so with one accord Our lips may tell Thy name; Give Thou the hearing ear, Fix Thou the wandering thought, That those we teach may hear The great things Thou hast wrought.

Speak Thou for us, O Lord, In all we say of Thee; According to Thy Word Let all our teaching be; That so Thy lambs may know Their own true Shepherd's voice, Where'er He leads them go, And in His love rejoice.
